name: The Fool
meaning: Prepare to embark on new beginnings

name: The Magician
meaning: The timing is perfect to start manifesting your own dreams and desires.

name: The High Priestess
meaning: Look within and trust your own intuition

name: The Empress
meaning: Relax and allow yourself to be open to all forms of love

name: The Emperor
meaning: You're in control, so don't be afraid to take action

name: The Hierophant
meaning: Continue learning while also upholding your own values

name: The Lovers
meaning: You're in alignment with yourself, healthy relationships can blossom.

name: The Chariot
meaning: You're on the right path, be intentional and prepare to take action

name: Strength
meaning: Be confident and trust yourself when it comes to overcoming obstacles

name: The Hermit
meaning: Take some time to connect with your inner self

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning: Embrace life's cycles of ups and downs to invite what's meant for you

name: Justice
meaning: Truth will be revealed in due time. Remain true to yourself.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning: Take a breath, reflect, and change your perspective on your situation.

name: Death
meaning: Embrace that a transformation is afloat. Release what no longer serves you.

name: Temperance
meaning: Trust in divine timing.

name: The Devil
meaning: Confront unhealthy behaviors that are present as the first step to healing.

name: The Tower
meaning: Sudden breakdowns and upheavals are occurring to bring in new opportunities.

name: The Star
meaning: Hope and healing from your situation are coming soon. Don't lose faith.

name: The Moon
meaning: Things once hidden are going to be revealed. Trust your intuition.

name: The Sun
meaning: You'll receive clarity on your situation, continue to be optimistic.

name: Judgement
meaning: Accepting what has happened in the past is necessary in order to move forward.

name: The World
meaning: A cycle is ending allowing for you to reap the rewards and begin a new journey.

name: Ace of Cups
meaning: Self love, existing relationships, and/or new connections will flourish.

name: Two of Cups
meaning: There are shared feelings in this harmonious relationship.

name: Three of Cups
meaning: Enjoy spending some time with your friends and family. Relax and have fun.

name: Four of Cups
meaning: Focusing on the past leads to stagnation. New opportunities are around.

name: Five of Cups
meaning: It's okay to cry it out. This sadness won't last forever as two cups still remain.

name: Six of Cups
meaning: Reconnect with your inner child to experience feelings of comfort and safety.

name: Seven of Cups
meaning: Your possibilities are endless, figure out how to turn your dreams into reality.

name: Eight of Cups
meaning: Don't settle for less. Follow your heart and walk away for deeper fulfillment.

name: Nine of Cups
meaning: Don't downplay the wealth you have accumulated in aspects of your life.

name: Ten of Cups
meaning: You have reached emotional fulfillment and happiness. Express your gratitude.

name: Page of Cups
meaning: Flirtatious energy is in the air. Have some fun while being open to receiving messages.

name: Knight of Cups
meaning: Offerings are coming in fast, don't be fooled by the quick charm of others.

name: Queen of Cups
meaning: Embrace your sensitive side approaching life with compassion and emotional maturity.

name: King of Cups
meaning: Uphold your boundaries while staying kind and composed.

name: Ace of Pentacles
meaning: A new opportunity in regards to abundance is on the way.

name: Two of Pentacles
meaning: Try to find a healthy balance when juggling multiple obligations.

name: Three of Pentacles
meaning: Collaborate and share ideas with your peers to invite in future opportunities.

name: Four of Pentacles
meaning: Seeking stability is stunting possible growth and causing insecurity.

name: Five of Pentacles
meaning: You may be struggling and dealing with loss. Don't be afraid to ask for help.

name: Six of Pentacles
meaning: Be willing and open to receiving without feeling undeserving.

name: Seven of Pentacles
meaning: Stay patient and don't be discouraged. Focus on how far you've come.

name: Eight of Pentacles
meaning: Continue building your skills. Your hard work won't go unnoticed.

name: Nine of Pentacles
meaning: You've worked hard to cultivate your wealth. Embrace it and treat yourself.

name: Ten of Pentacles
meaning: You have built long lasting wealth and security to pass on to your community.

name: Page of Pentacles
meaning: Start building the foundation for future prosperity and lasting abundance.

name: Knight of Pentacles
meaning: Slow down, set realistic goals, and show up to create long term abundance.

name: Queen of Pentacles
meaning: Appreciate what is around you and how far you've come, while staying grounded.

name: King of Pentacles
meaning: There is someone in your life that is financially stable and down to earth.

name: Ace of Swords
meaning: New insignt and ideas are emerging. Invest in them for great outcomes!

name: Two of Swords
meaning: You are in the cross-swords of two decisions! Rely on your intuition to make a choice.

name: Three of Swords
meaning: Allow yourself to feel the sadness and pain from your situation to lead to healing.

name: Four of Swords
meaning: It's time to meditate and give yourself some well deserved R&R.

name: Five of Swords
meaning: You feel you may have won, but there is still a loss resulting from this conflict.

name: Six of Swords
meaning: You're on a healing journey. Keep moving forward as the worst already is behind you.

name: Seven of Swords
meaning: Something is being hidden from you in your situation. Be careful of liars and manipulators.

name: Eight of Swords
meaning: You might feel trapped, but believe in yourself instead of circumstance controlling you.

name: Nine of Swords
meaning: Make some changes, so that your wellness is longer being disrupted by stress.

name: Ten of Swords
meaning: A painful situation is ending. The worst has happened, now there's nowhere to go but up.

name: Page of Swords
meaning: Pay attention to messages you'll be receiving. Stay curious and seek the truth.

name: Knight of Swords
meaning: The truth is coming in fast and confrontation cannot be avoided.

name: Queen of Swords
meaning: Approach the situation logically using the truth, rather than emotionally.

name: King of Swords
meaning: Take action and make a decision with logic to attain success.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning: A flash of inspiration will strike offering you motivation to guide you on your journey.

name: Two of Wands
meaning: The world is in your hands. Exciting plans await you, but a choice will have to be made.

name: Three of Wands
meaning: Embrace the exciting changes that lie ahead of you as you take these next steps.

name: Four of Wands
meaning: Important milestones will be reached. Make sure to celebrate your wins!

name: Five of Wands
meaning: View this conflict as a healthy competition leading to improvement.

name: Six of Wands
meaning: You've emerged victorious, be proud of yourself without downplaying your wins.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning: Stand up for your beliefs in the face of adversity and challengers.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning: Important news will be coming in quick. Go with the flow.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning: Don't give up now, continue persisting to reach your end goal.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning: You may feel overwhelmed right now, it's okay to say no for your own wellbeing.

name: Page of Wands
meaning: Engage in exciting conversations to introduce you to fun new adventures.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning: Act on your ideas with this burst of passion. Everything will fall into place swiftly.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning: Accept the passionate and ambitious energy around you with confidence.

name: King of Wands
meaning: Pick up some responsibilities. Make decisions with confidence and stick with it.
